title: Character Visual Representation Schema
description: Guidelines and specifications for the consistent visual depiction of a character across different media forms and artistic styles.

movement_style.description: How the character typically moves, including posture, gait, gestures, and mannerisms that reflect their personality and physical attributes.

emotion.description: The specific emotional state being depicted.

description.description: How this character uniquely expresses this emotion through facial expressions and body language.

expressions.description: Guidelines for how the character's face and body express various emotions, accounting for their unique personality and appearance.

animation_guidelines.description: Specifications for depicting the character in motion, whether in animation or sequential art, to ensure consistency with their personality and physical traits.
